org.mymedialite.data
Class Ratings

java.lang.Object
  org.mymedialite.data.DataSet
      org.mymedialite.data.Ratings
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Double>, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Double>, java.util.List<java.lang.Double>, IDataSet, IRatings
Direct Known Subclasses:
CombinedRatings, RatingsProxy, StaticRatings, TimedRatings
public class Ratings
extends DataSet
implements IRatings

Data structure for storing ratings Small memory overhead for added flexibility. This data structure supports incremental updates.
